槥字的基本解释

槥
huì
小棺材：“令士卒从军死者，为槥归其县”。

槥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huì］
［《廣韻》祥歲切，去祭，邪。］
［《廣韻》于歲切，去祭，云。］
亦作“檅1”。亦作“櫘1”。
小棺材。

槥字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槥； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页546第29
【唐韻】祥歲切，音篲。【說文】棺櫝也。【前漢·高帝紀】令從軍死者爲槥，歸其縣。【註】槥櫝爲小棺。　又【廣韻】于歲切，音衞。【集韻】胡桂切，音惠。又【集韻】【類篇】?須銳切，音歲。義?同。

槥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
槥字的起名意思

暂无。

Li
Basic explanation of words
Li
huì
Small coffin: "For those who died in the army, they will return to their county."
Li
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huì］
["Guang Yun" Cheung Sui cut, go to sacrifice, evil. ]
["Guangyun" cuts at every year, to sacrifice, cloud. ]
Also known as "檅1". Also known as "櫘1".
Small coffin.
Li
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槥; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 546 29
[Tang Yun] Cheung Sui cut, sound 篲. [Said the text] The coffin is also. [Pre-Han · Gao Di Ji] Order the deceased from the army to be Chuan and go to the county. [Note] Citrus chinensis is a small coffin.　[Guang Yun] Yu Suiqie, sound guard. [Jiyun] Hu Guiqie, Yinhui. Also [Jiyun] [Class Chapter]? Must be sharp, sound years old. Righteous? Same.
